text:
Hey Muqarrab - my apologies for the delay in getting back to you. Things have been crazy (as you can probably tell from the media :eyes:)

It definitely seems like you have smashed the work experience! I didn't have any relevant work experience until I went to university so you've got a great headstart and you've already demonstrated that you're proactive (by walking in the care home and asking straight up!)

So you said you'll likely be doing a personal statement in the coming weeks/months. Do you know what degree/what uni you are interested in? Also, what grades are you expecting? That way I can advise you better!
Would be happy to give you feedback on potential choices you have (if you have any yet) and which is likely the best for you!
